column4: hi, please i got a question, how can i make a usb bootable ubuntu partition? i don't wana use programs.

my idea is to mount the ubuntu iso on my system, dd it to the usb, and then make a mbr on the 0 sector, but to make that, i need that dd do not dump part of the ubuntu image into sector 0, because mbr would overwrite that data
yeah its a flash, and i don't want to use any program, please, just one to make the mbr
